title: [Kids' fun: a compilation of cartoon adventures]
creator_credit: Castle Films, Animafilm Studio and Romania Film
brief_description: A collection of Romanian and classic American animation. First up are four fun-filled Romanian cartoons designed for young children (Music and sound affects, no spoken words). The characters Michaela, Benny and Tommy are seen here having fun with all of their animal friends. Following is a collection of classic American cartoons made between the 1930’s and 1950’s including the first Heckle and Jeckle cartoon.
